articles.original_title: Light Vehicle Industry Forecasts for Q3 2025 with Assessments of All Major OEMs Including BMW, Toyota, and Tesla
articles.original_body: The report highlights opportunities in growth patterns among top OEMs, regional sales trends, and production forecasts. It offers insights into market dynamics in major regions like Asia-Pacific, Europe, and North America, enabling stakeholders to make informed decisions and adapt strategies for long-term success.Dublin, Nov. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Light Vehicle Forecast - Quarter 3 2025" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.The Global Light Vehicle Forecast repo
